summary: The human body is made up of cells, tissues, organs, and systems. It has a head, hair, neck, torso, genitals, arms, hands, legs, and feet on the outside. Inside, there are organs, bones, muscles, blood vessels, and more. The study of the body includes anatomy (its structure) and physiology (how it works). Many parts work together to keep the body balanced and healthy. People like doctors, scientists, and artists study the body to understand it better.
title: Human body
